thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 30 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Retail Estates: ‍Capital Increase Through Contribution In Kind Of 5 Retail Buildings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Retail Estates: ‍Capital Increase Through Contribution In Kind Of 5 Retail Buildings
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - RETAIL ESTATES NV:
* ‍CAPITAL INCREASE THROUGH CONTRIBUTION IN KIND OF 5 RETAIL BUILDINGS​
* ‍FOUR RETAIL BUILDINGS LOCATED IN A RETAIL PARK IN LIBRAMONT WERE BROUGHT IN FOR A CONTRIBUTION VALUE OF EUR 5.46 MILLION​
* ‍23,076 NEW REGISTERED SHARES WERE ISSUED AT AN ISSUE PRICE OF EUR 65​
* RETAIL BUILDING LOCATED IN HERSTAL (LIEGE) WAS BROUGHT IN FOR CONTRIBUTION VALUE OF EUR 1.5 MILLION
* ‍ONE RETAIL BUILDING IN HERSTAL (LIEGE) WAS BROUGHT IN FOR A CONTRIBUTION VALUE OF EUR 1.5 MILLION​
* ON HERSTAL BUILDING: 23,076 NEW REGISTERED SHARES WERE ISSUED AT ISSUE PRICE OF EUR 65
* ‍NEW SHARES ARE BEING ISSUED WITH COUPON 25 ATTACHED, REPRESENTING DIVIDEND RIGHT FOR CURRENT FY
* APPOINTED CONSORTIUM OF BANKS KBC SECURITIES, BELFIUS BANK, ING AND KEMPEN TO ASSIST IT IN POSSIBLE ADDITIONAL CAPITAL INCREASE
* EXPECTS TO OBTAIN A DUAL LISTING ON EURONEXT AMSTERDAM IN THE SHORT TERM
* SHARES REPRESENT CAPITAL INCREASE OF EUR 0.5 MILLION AND ISSUE PREMIUM FOR BALANCE OF EUR 1.0 MILLION​
* ADMISSION TO TRADING ON EURONEXT AMSTERDAM HAS BEEN APPLIED FOR
* ‍NEW SHARES PARTICIPATE IN PROFIT OF CURRENT FY FROM 1 APRIL, 2017 TO 31 MARCH, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
